Movie & Dining: 25% discount (up to Rs. 100) on movie ticket bookings on BookMyShow on booking a minimum of 2 tickets in a single transaction. Offer can be availed maximum twice in a month.
Rewards Rate: 3 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent with the card (except fuel, utility and insurance spends), 2 Reward Points per Rs. 100 on utility payments
Reward Redemption: The earned Reward Points can be redeemed against gifts or the card's outstanding balance at a rate of 1 Reward Point = Rs. 0.25.
Domestic Lounge Access: 1 complimentary access to domestic airport lounges per quarter.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on expenditure of Rs. 1.5 lakh in the previous year.
fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: Rs. 99 (plus applicable taxes) per redemption request
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived off at HPCL filling station across India on transactions of not more than Rs. 4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.50% of the withdrawn amount, subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 300

product_details: You can personalize the credit card design and look and make it unique as per your liking. You can choose from the given designs on the bankâ€™s website or you can even have your own picture on your credit card.
